thig1.1:4.1: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
thig1.1:5.2: wrapped in the cloth you sewed yourself;
thig1.1:5.3: for your desire has been quelled,
thig1.1:5.4: like vegetables boiled dry in a pot.
thig1.1:6.1: It was thus that this verse was recited by a certain unnamed nun.
